nodes.text: A peach was a type of fruit edible to humans. Prior to the Clone Wars, a pantry in the Jedi Temple contained purple peaches. On one occasion, Jedi Padawan Anakin Skywalker fell through a shaft that led to the pantry, and he took one of the peaches as a snack.
Peaches first appeared in the canon junior novel Choose Your Destiny: An Obi-Wan & Anakin Adventure, which was written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019.
